title: Check Point Harmony Email & Collaboration - Messaging and File Sharing Application Insights
description: This dashboard provides insights into messaging and file-sharing activities, tracking event trends, external interactions, and security actions. It helps monitor deleted, quarantined, and shared files for better data protection and compliance.

definition.content:
[Check Point Harmony Email & Collaboration](https://www.checkpoint.com/harmony/email-security/) is a security solution that protects cloud-based email and collaboration platforms from cyber threats like malware, phishing, and data loss.

**Messaging and File Sharing Application Insights** dashboard provides insights into messaging and file-sharing activities, tracking event trends, external interactions, and security actions. It helps monitor deleted, quarantined, and shared files for better data protection and compliance.

For more information, see the [Check Point Harmony Email & Collaboration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/checkpoint_harmony_email_and_collaboration/).

**Tips**:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.
